schools.name: Okawville Grade School
schools.school-summary: Okawville Grade School, a public school located in Okawville, IL, serves grades PK-6 in the West Washington County Community Unit School District 10.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 5 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.district-name: West Washington County Community Unit School District 10
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Okawville Jr/Sr High School
schools.school-summary: Okawville Jr/Sr High School, a public school located in Okawville, IL, serves grades 7-12 in the West Washington County Community Unit School District 10.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 5 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
